explanation: [0-0] A steering wheel is in the foreground with a pair of hands resting on it. A needle with white thread and some already sewn stitches are visible on the black steering wheel cover. The background is blurry.

[0-7] Then, the hands skillfully thread the needle through pre-punched holes. After a few stitches, the person pulls the thread taut to ensure a tight seam. They then continue repeating the same process, sewing the cover onto the steering wheel.
